cycle_time.description: Amount of times per second this message should update

signals.description: All of the individual messages in this group

resolution.description: Finest resolution that this message requires, determines amount of bits that are required

bits.description: Explicit Declaration of amount of bits required for CAN Message

min.description: Minimum Value this CAN Message can take on

max.description: Maximum Value this CAN Message can take on

unit.description: Units that are used to measure this message, (Optional)

signed.description: Whether or not the integer must be signed

start_bit.description: Overrides which start bit should be used in the message. Signals will be tightly-packed unless otherwise specified, one after another, in the order they are specified.
